info.title: Wsdot Traffic Flow API
info.description: Wsdot Traffic Flow API - Washington State Department of Transportation APIs

Description.description: Human-readable description of the roadway location, such as interchange names or cross streets.

Direction.description: Traffic direction designation: N, S, B, NB, or SB, indicating which side of the highway is affected.

Latitude.description: Latitude of the roadway location in decimal degrees.

Longitude.description: Longitude of the roadway location in decimal degrees.

MilePost.description: Milepost marker along the highway corridor, with 0 indicating route terminus.

RoadName.description: Highway or route designation code, such as '005' for I-5 or '090' for I-90.

RoadwayLocation.description: Roadway location information including route, milepost, coordinates, and direction.

FlowDataID.description: Numeric ID of the traffic flow station.

FlowReadingValue.description: Code indicating traffic flow condition: 0 = Unknown, 1 = WideOpen, 2 = Moderate, 3 = Heavy, 4 = StopAndGo, 5 = NoData.

Description.description: Human-readable description of the roadway location, such as interchange names or cross streets.

Direction.description: Traffic direction designation: N, S, B, NB, or SB, indicating which side of the highway is affected.

Latitude.description: Latitude of the roadway location in decimal degrees.

Longitude.description: Longitude of the roadway location in decimal degrees.

MilePost.description: Milepost marker along the highway corridor, with 0 indicating route terminus.

RoadName.description: Highway or route designation code, such as '005' for I-5 or '090' for I-90.

FlowStationLocation.description: Roadway location information for the traffic flow station.

Region.description: WSDOT region that maintains the traffic flow station.

StationName.description: Station identifier code combining route, direction, and milepost.

Time.description: UTC datetime when the traffic flow reading was taken.

FetchTrafficFlowByIdOutput.description: Real-time traffic flow data from a sensor station, including flow condition, location, region, and measurement timestamp.

get.summary: List current traffic flow conditions for all stations statewide.

FlowDataID.description: Numeric ID of the traffic flow station.

FlowReadingValue.description: Code indicating traffic flow condition: 0 = Unknown, 1 = WideOpen, 2 = Moderate, 3 = Heavy, 4 = StopAndGo, 5 = NoData.

Latitude.description: Latitude of the roadway location in decimal degrees.

MilePost.description: Milepost marker along the highway corridor, with 0 indicating route terminus.

RoadName.description: Highway or route designation code, such as '005' for I-5 or '090' for I-90.

FlowStationLocation.description: Roadway location information for the traffic flow station.

Region.description: WSDOT region that maintains the traffic flow station.

StationName.description: Station identifier code combining route, direction, and milepost.

items.description: Real-time traffic flow data from a sensor station, including flow condition, location, region, and measurement timestamp.

sampleResponse.description: Example of a successful response from the API (showing first item of 1462 total)

get.summary: Get current traffic flow condition for a specific station by ID.

sampleResponse.description: Example of a successful response from the API

tags.name: flow-data
tags.description: Real-time traffic flow conditions from sensor stations across Washington state.
tags.x-description: Current traffic flow readings, station locations, and timestamps for traffic monitoring and congestion detection.
x-useCases: Monitor real-time traffic flow conditions across Washington highways.
Detect congestion and traffic patterns for route planning.
Display current traffic status in traveler information systems.
